items.sentence: After Tom replanted the trees, he watered them.
You're the ones who have acted inappropriately.
How much does it cost to run a washing machine?
Oh no! I forgot to turn on the washing machine.
Tom wishes he could be a better French speaker.
Tom didn't realize how little time he had left.
I prefer studying French with a native speaker.
Tom left his keys on his desk as he often does.
Tom says that he'll sign up for a French class.
I hate it when people think only of themselves.
